mapper.select:
SELECT MID, MPW, MNAME, MNICKNAME, MPHONE, MEMAIL, MADDR, MPROFILE, MMESSAGE, MSTATE, MJOINDATE, NVL(WM.MWARNING, 0) MWARNING FROM MEMBERS MB LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WMEDMID, COUNT(WMEDMID) MWARNING FROM WARNINGMEMBERS GROUP BY WMEDMID) WM ON MB.MID = WM.WMEDMID
WHERE MSTATE=1 AND MWARNING IS NULL
WHERE WM.MWARNING > 0
WHERE MSTATE=0
ORDER BY MJOINDATE
